# Drow (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Eilistraee, Ghaunadaur, Kiaransalee, [[Lolth]], Selvetarm, Vhaeraun |

**Granted Powers:** You gain [[Lightning Reflexes (Feat)|Lightning Reflexes]] as a bonus feat. 

**Drow Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Cloak of Dark Power (Spell)|Cloak of Dark Power]]****:** Cloak protects subject from effects of sunlight.

**2** **[[Clairaudience_Clairvoyance (Spell)|Clairaudience/Clairvoyance]]****:** See or hear at a distance for 1 minute/level.

**3** **[[Suggestion (Spell)|Suggestion]]****:** Compels subject to follow stated course of action.

**4** **[[Discern Lies (Spell)|Discern Lies]]****:** Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

**5 [[Arachnaform (Spell)|Arachnaform]]:** Polymorph into drider or Large spider.

**6 [[Dispelling Screen, Greater (Spell)|Dispelling Screen, Greater]]:** Targeted *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]* on any creatures and unattended items, +20 max on caster level check.

**7** **[[Word of Chaos (Spell)|Word of Chaos]]****:** Nonchaotic subject is killed, *[[Confused|confused]]*, [[Stunned|stunned]], or [[Deafened|deafened]].

**8** **[[Planar Ally, Greater (Spell)|Planar Ally, Greater]]****:** As *[[Planar Ally, Lesser (Spell)|lesser planar ally]]**,* but up to 24 HD.

**9** **[[Gate (Spell)|Gate]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** Connects two planes for travel or summoning.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 273 |
|---|---|
| | Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC), pg. 86 |
